text: No one tool alone is going to stop the #COVID19 pandemic. A combination of getting a COVID-19 #vaccine, wearing a mask, staying at least 6 feet away from others, and washing your hands often are all needed. Learn more: https://t.co/rFBVQ5p8CX #NH #newhampshire #covidvaccine #603 https://t.co/NaN1FO9Ao3
